Package pieces

Class Board.Node

java.lang.Object
pieces.Board.Node
Enclosing class:
Board
public class Board.Node
extends java.lang.Object
Nodes which represent spots on the board and can hold Pieces

  • Constructor Details

    • Node

      public Node​(boolean occupied, boolean safe, Piece piece, int x, int y, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String node, Board.Node next)
      Node constructor to create a Node
      Parameters:
      occupied - True if Node is filled with a piece
      safe - True if Node is not under threat by attacking piece
      piece - Piece object inside of Node
      x - X Coordinate
      y - Y Coordinate
      text - Text to display for printing of board
      node - String label which is used to get Node from player command (i.e a6)
      next - Points to next Node for traversal

    • Node

      public Node​(Board.Node otherNode)
      Creates a deep copy of a Node for testing
      Parameters:
      otherNode - Node to be copied
